name: CFXMLParserOptions
desc: Options you can use to control the parser's treatment of an XML document.

items.name: static var validateDocument: CFXMLParserOptions
items.desc: Validates the document against its grammar from the DTD, reporting any errors. Currently not supported.

items.name: static var skipMetaData: CFXMLParserOptions
items.desc: Silently skip over metadata constructs (the DTD and comments).

items.name: static var replacePhysicalEntities: CFXMLParserOptions
items.desc: Replaces declared entities like <. Note that other than the 5 predefined entities (lt, gt, quot, amp, apos), these must be defined in the DTD. Currently not supported.

items.name: static var addImpliedAttributes: CFXMLParserOptions
items.desc: Where the DTD specifies implied attribute-value pairs for a particular element, add those pairs to any occurrences of the element in the element tree. Currently not supported.

items.name: static var allOptions: CFXMLParserOptions
items.desc: Makes the parser do the most work, returning only the pure elementtree.
